com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction

Class ConsoleInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction
      • com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.ConsoleInteraction

  • public class ConsoleInteraction
extends Interaction
    Concrete class that provides interact method implementation of abstract Interaction class in order to let user interact with bot via standard console streams (System.in and System.out).
    Since:
    1.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Liavontsi Brechka
    See Also:
    Interaction

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String message
      Message sent by user
      protected BufferedReader reader
      Reader for user input.
      protected PrintWriter writer
      Writer for printing output to user.

      • Fields inherited from class com.liavontsibrechka.wit4j.interaction.Interaction

        httpCommunication, input, output

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ConsoleInteraction(HttpCommunicationType httpCommunicationType)
      Creates concrete implementation of Interaction class via standard console (System.in and System.out are encapsulated by BufferedReader and PrintWriter respectively) by using specified HttpCommunicationType.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void interact()
      Reads input and writes appropriate output to user.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleInteraction

        protected ConsoleInteraction(HttpCommunicationType httpCommunicationType)
        Creates concrete implementation of Interaction class via standard console (System.in and System.out are encapsulated by BufferedReader and PrintWriter respectively) by using specified HttpCommunicationType.
        Parameters:
        httpCommunicationType - enum type of HttpCommunicationType for dynamic instantiation of HttpCommunication subclasses through HttpCommunicationFactory.
        See Also:
        HttpCommunication, HttpCommunicationType, HttpCommunicationFactory

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        public void interact()
              throws IOException
        Reads input and writes appropriate output to user. Communicates with bot through specific HttpCommunication object and its methods (handleHttpResponse and sendHttpRequest).
        Specified by:
        interact in class Interaction
        Throws:
        IOException - IOException if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        HttpCommunication
